data.title: audience
data.value: This offering suits our customers that have an internal technical staff, but occasionally need technology specialists to assist in the evolution of their IT landscape.

data.title: Support your initiatives
data.value: Nikondi's project support service provides our customers with talented technical professionals that can assist with customers internal projects and initiatives. As our customer, you give us a list of the requirements and expectations of the professional needed for the project, and we tap into our pool of experts to find a perfect match. After the selection process, the professional can become a part of your team and help spearhead the project to completion.
